about_the_game:
"Nanoplanet Survivors: A Relentless Battle for Existence"

In "Nanoplanet Survivors," players are thrust into an unyielding bullet hell odyssey on a hostile exoplanet overrun with alien menaces. Each encounter is a test of survival, demanding quick reflexes and strategic use of character upgrades and abilities.

This game is a symphony of survival and strategy, where no two experiences are alike. Players confront a myriad of alien foes – from towering extraterrestrial behemoths to relentless hordes – all while the intensity of battle escalates with each wave.

Features


  • Engage in an immersive bullet hell survival experience, demanding skill and strategic adaptation.
  • Encounter an ever-evolving roster of alien adversaries, with each wave presenting increasingly formidable challenges.
  • Utilize a diverse array of character abilities and ultimate powers for tactical advantage.
  • Acquire and leverage powerful upgrades, customizing your approach to each unique playthrough.
  • Face epic showdowns against colossal world bosses, testing the limits of your survival skills.
  • Challenge a variety of wave bosses, each presenting unique patterns and tactics to overcome.
  • Unlock a diverse range of characters, pets, and abilities, adding depth and variety to gameplay.
  • Experience a dynamic game environment, where adaptability is key to enduring the relentless onslaught.
  • Achieve meta-progression with unlockables that enhance your capabilities in subsequent runs.
  • Earn challenging achievements that highlight your journey and prowess on the nanoplanet.
In "Nanoplanet Survivors," the fate of humanity hangs in the balance. As the ultimate survivor, are you prepared to face the relentless dangers of this nanoplanet?

name: Nanoplanet Survivors

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11, DX12 capable
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11, DX12 capable
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

short_description: Nanoplanet Survivors is a heart-pounding bullet hell survival game set on a hostile planet. Battle relentless waves of alien foes and adapt with powerful upgrades and unique character abilities. Epic boss fights make every playthrough a thrilling challenge. Can you emerge as the ultimate survivor?
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Japanese*, Korean*, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America*
*languages with full audio support
